alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 2:32AM MDT until October 24 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and localized blowing snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches with locally heavier accumulations in the higher foothills. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Red Lodge Foothills. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to heavy wet snow accumulations and very poor visibility. The combination of heavy wet snow, along with the strong winds, may result in tree and power line damage causing sporadic power outages. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This includes portions of US-212 and Highway 78.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
